name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3D新衣装お披露目!! 兎田ぺこら生誕祭ライブ♪【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [jgoJuJiWtf4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Pekora and Korone perform 'Positive Dance Time' on a futuristic, colorful 3D stage.
Transition scene where Pekora reveals her new 3D outfit through a transformation animation.
Pekora and Moona Hoshinova perform 'Turing Love' together on stage.

subtitles.original: チューリングラブ
subtitles.english: Turing Love

subtitles.original: 作詞：ナユタン星人(ナユタナアルカ)
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Nayutalien (Nayutana Alka)

subtitles.original: 作曲：ナユタン星人
subtitles.english: Composition: Nayutalien

subtitles.original: あ、恋の定義がわからない
subtitles.english: Ah, I don't know the definition of love

subtitles.original: まず計測機がわからない
subtitles.english: First, I don't know the measuring device

subtitles.original: 要は恋してる時が恋らしい
subtitles.english: In short, being in love is what love's like
Just 1, 2, 3

subtitles.original: あ、愛の方程式解けない
subtitles.english: Ah, I can't solve the equation of love

subtitles.original: まず普通の計算も解けない
subtitles.english: First off, I can't even do normal math

subtitles.original: 要はそんな状態が愛らしい
subtitles.english: In short, that state itself is lovely

subtitles.original: I know, you know
subtitles.english: I know, you know

subtitles.original: もう大抵の事象において Q を置いて A を出して解けるのに
subtitles.english: I can solve it by putting Q and getting A in most cases, but...

subtitles.original: 勘違って間違って 解のないこの気持ちは ララララ
subtitles.english: Misunderstanding, making mistakes, this feelings with no answer, la la la la

subtitles.original: 検証 is 明瞭
subtitles.english: Verification is clear

subtitles.original: 感情論は相対性
subtitles.english: Emotional theories are relativity

subtitles.original: チューリングラブ 見つめあったって解けないメロウ
subtitles.english: Turing Love, a mellow that can't be solved even if we stare at each other

subtitles.original: ワッツイズラブ？ 今は 1, 2, 3 で証拠を出そうか
subtitles.english: What is love? Let's show the evidence now with 1, 2, 3

subtitles.original: 言葉で生み出す結晶 鼓動でたどるアンサー
subtitles.english: Crystals created by words, the answer traced by heartbeats

subtitles.original: 測ったって不確定性 僕らの BPM
subtitles.english: Even if measured, it's uncertainty, our BPM

subtitles.original: チューリングラブ 証明待ったなし信じなきゃノー
subtitles.english: Turing Love, no waiting for proof, if you don't believe, it's a no
